code: export default function useContainerWidth(prefixCls){const getContainerWidth=(ele,width)=>{const container=ele.querySelector(".".concat(prefixCls,"-container"));let returnWidth=width;if(container){const style=getComputedStyle(container);const borderLeft=parseInt(style.borderLeftWidth,10);const borderRight=parseInt(style.borderRightWidth,10);returnWidth=width-borderLeft-borderRight;}return returnWidth;};return getContainerWidth;}
